model_answer: B: Because Venus has a much thicker atmosphere that drives an extreme greenhouse effect.

The correct statements are: A: It lies beyond Neptune (as shown on the slide), is largely made of ice, and its objects can develop visible tails when heated by the Sun. C: It appears in the slide’s list of “Smaller Objects in Our Solar System,” and the narration describes it as an icy region whose bodies can become comets when warmed by the Sun.
